credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen
Technique: long-armed cross, herringbone, double running, detached looping, buttonhole, and couching stitches on plain weave
description: Cross borders showing people, animals, a house, Adam and Eve and a border of identified crowns with two inscriptions.
name: Sampler
